dict.acceptation: 医生，大夫；博士；神学家；医疗设备；
修理，装配；假造；搀杂；修改，修饰；

sent.orig: The Doctor systems provide extensive information on the performance of engines quickly, simply and accurately.
sent.trans: Doctor系统快速，便捷，准确的提供主机的工况。

sent.orig: Installed Doctor systems are available in two versions.
DOCTOR: PORTABLE, INTEGRATED SHIP ENGINE MONITORING SYSTEM.
sent.trans: Doctor:便携式集成化的主机性能检测系统。

sent.orig: ADVANTAGES OF CYLINDER AND FUEL PRESSURE MONITORING WITH THE DOCTOR SYSTEM.
sent.trans: Doctor气压和油压检测系统的好处。

sent.orig: If doctor would doctor another doctor would doctor doing the doctoring doctordoctor in another doctoring way?
sent.trans: 假如那位医生要医治另外一位医生，医者会不会以另外一种医术医治受医者？
